verses.text: \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διασωθέντες|strong="G1295"\w*, \w τότε|strong="G5119"\w* \w ἐπέγνωσαν|strong="G1921"\w*\f + \fr 28:1 \ft επεγνωσαν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ επεγνωμεν ℵA,B,C [4%] NU ¦ two other variants\f* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w Μελίτη|strong="G3194"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w νῆσος|strong="G3520"\w* \w καλεῖται|strong="G2564"\w*.

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w*\f + \fr 28:2 \ft δε \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵ [92%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ τε A,B,C [8%] NU\f* \w βάρβαροι|strong="G0915"\w* \w παρεῖχον|strong="G3930"\w* \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τυχοῦσαν|strong="G5177"\w* \w φιλανθρωπίαν|strong="G5363"\w* \w ἡμῖν|strong="G1473"\w*, \w ἀνάψαντες|strong="G0381"\w*\f + \fr 28:2 \ft αναψαντες \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [94%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ αψαντες ℵA,B,C [6%] NU\f* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w πυράν|strong="G4443"\w*, \w προσελάβοντο|strong="G4355"\w* \w πάντας|strong="G3956"\w* \w ἡμᾶς|strong="G1473"\w*, \w διὰ|strong="G1223"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὑετὸν|strong="G5205"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐφεστῶτα|strong="G2186"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διὰ|strong="G1223"\w*\f + \fr 28:2 \ft δια \+it rell\+it* ¦ — ℵ [15%]\f* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ψῦχος|strong="G5592"\w*.

\w Συστρέψαντος|strong="G4962"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παύλου|strong="G3972"\w* \w φρυγάνων|strong="G5434"\w*\f + \fr 28:3 \ft φρυγανων \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵ [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ 1 τι A,B,C [5%] NU\f* \w πλῆθος|strong="G4128"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐπιθέντος|strong="G2007"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w πυράν|strong="G4443"\w*, \w ἔχιδνα|strong="G2191"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w*\f + \fr 28:3 \ft εκ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [70%] HF,RP,TR,CP ¦ απο ℵA,B,C [30%] OC,NU\f* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θέρμης|strong="G2329"\w* \w ἐξελθοῦσα|strong="G1831"\w*\f + \fr 28:3 \ft εξελθουσα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,B,C [35%] TR,NU ¦ διεξελθουσα [65%] HF,RP,OC,CP\f* καθήψατο\f + \fr 28:3 \ft καθηψατο \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* C [25%] ¦ καθηψεν ℵA,B [72%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP,NU ¦ καθεικε [3%]\f* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w χειρὸς|strong="G5495"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w εἶδον|strong="G3708"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w βάρβαροι|strong="G0915"\w* \w κρεμάμενον|strong="G2910"\w*\f + \fr 28:4 \ft κρεμαμενον \+it rell\+it* ¦ κρεμμαμενον [15%]\f* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θηρίον|strong="G2342"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w χειρὸς|strong="G5495"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἔλεγον|strong="G3004"\w* \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w ἀλλήλους|strong="G0240"\w*,\f + \fr 28:4 \ft ελεγον προς αλληλους \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [92%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ~ 231 ℵA,B,C [8%] NU\f* «\w Πάντως|strong="G3843"\w* \w φονεύς|strong="G5406"\w* \w ἐστιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἄνθρωπος|strong="G0444"\w* \w οὗτος|strong="G3778"\w*, \w ὃν|strong="G3739"\w* \w διασωθέντα|strong="G1295"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θαλάσσης|strong="G2281"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Δίκη|strong="G1349"\w* \w ζῆν|strong="G2198"\w* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w εἴασεν|strong="G1439"\w*.»

\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μὲν|strong="G3303"\w* \w οὖν|strong="G3767"\w*, ἀποτιναξάμενος\f + \fr 28:5 \ft αποτιναξαμενος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A [55%] ¦ αποτιναξας ℵB [45%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP,NU\f* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θηρίον|strong="G2342"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πῦρ|strong="G4442"\w*, \w ἔπαθεν|strong="G3958"\w* \w οὐδὲν|strong="G3762"\w* \w κακόν|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w προσεδόκων|strong="G4328"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w μέλλειν|strong="G3195"\w* \w πίμπρασθαι|strong="G4092"\w*, \w ἢ|strong="G3588"\w* \w καταπίπτειν|strong="G2667"\w* \w ἄφνω|strong="G0869"\w* \w νεκρόν|strong="G3498"\w*· \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w πολὺ|strong="G4183"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w* \w προσδοκώντων|strong="G4328"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w θεωρούντων|strong="G2334"\w* \w μηδὲν|strong="G3367"\w* \w ἄτοπον|strong="G0824"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w γινόμενον|strong="G1096"\w*, \w μεταβαλλόμενοι|strong="G3328"\w*\f + \fr 28:6 \ft μεταβαλλομενοι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵ [87%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ μεταβαλομενοι A,B [13%] NU\f* \w ἔλεγον|strong="G3004"\w* \w θεὸν|strong="G2316"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w εἶναι|strong="G1510"\w*.\f + \fr 28:6 \ft θεον αυτον ειναι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [96%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ~ 213 [2%] ¦ ~ 231 ℵB [2%] NU ¦ ~ 321 A\f*

\w Ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w περὶ|strong="G4012"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τόπον|strong="G5117"\w* \w ἐκεῖνον|strong="G1565"\w* \w ὑπῆρχεν|strong="G5225"\w* \w χωρία|strong="G5564"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρώτῳ|strong="G4413"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w νήσου|strong="G3520"\w*, \w ὀνόματι|strong="G3686"\w* \w Ποπλίῳ|strong="G4196"\w*, \w ὃς|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἀναδεξάμενος|strong="G0324"\w* \w ἡμᾶς|strong="G1473"\w* \w τρεῖς|strong="G5140"\w* \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w* \w φιλοφρόνως|strong="G5390"\w* \w ἐξένισεν|strong="G3579"\w*.

\w Ἐγένετο|strong="G1096"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w πατέρα|strong="G3962"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ποπλίου|strong="G4196"\w* \w πυρετοῖς|strong="G4446"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w δυσεντερίᾳ|strong="G1420"\w*\f + \fr 28:8 \ft δυσεντερια \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [50%] HF,RP,TR,CP ¦ δυσεντεριω ℵA,B [50%] OC,NU\f* \w συνεχόμενον|strong="G4912"\w* \w κατακεῖσθαι|strong="G2621"\w*· \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w ὃν|strong="G3739"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παῦλος|strong="G3972"\w* \w εἰσελθὼν|strong="G1525"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w προσευξάμενος|strong="G4336"\w*,\f + \fr 28:8 \ft προσευξαμενος \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 και [2%] OC\f* \w ἐπιθεὶς|strong="G2007"\w* \w τὰς|strong="G3588"\w* \w χεῖρας|strong="G5495"\w* \w αὐτῷ|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἰάσατο|strong="G2390"\w* \w αὐτόν|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Τούτου|strong="G3778"\w* \w οὖν|strong="G3767"\w*\f + \fr 28:9 \ft ουν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [92%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ δε ℵA,B [8%] NU\f* \w γενομένου|strong="G1096"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λοιποὶ|strong="G3062"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔχοντες|strong="G2192"\w* \w ἀσθενείας|strong="G0769"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w νήσῳ|strong="G3520"\w*\f + \fr 28:9 \ft εχοντες ασθενειας εν τη νησω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ~ 34512 ℵA,B [5%] NU\f* \w προσήρχοντο|strong="G4334"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐθεραπεύοντο|strong="G2323"\w*·

\w οἳ|strong="G3588"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w πολλαῖς|strong="G4183"\w* \w τιμαῖς|strong="G5092"\w* \w ἐτίμησαν|strong="G5091"\w* \w ἡμᾶς|strong="G1473"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀναγομένοις|strong="G0321"\w* \w ἐπέθεντο|strong="G2007"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w χρείαν|strong="G5532"\w*.\f + \fr 28:10 \ft την χρειαν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [90%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ τας χρειας ℵA,B [10%] NU\f* Rome

\w Μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τρεῖς|strong="G5140"\w* \w μῆνας|strong="G3376"\w* \w ἀνήχθημεν|strong="G0321"\w*\f + \fr 28:11 \ft ανηχθημεν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,B [70%] HF,OC,TR,NU ¦ ηχθημεν [30%] RP,CP\f* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w πλοίῳ|strong="G4143"\w* \w παρακεχειμακότι|strong="G3914"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w νήσῳ|strong="G3520"\w*, \w Ἀλεξανδρίνῳ|strong="G0222"\w*,\f + \fr 28:11 \ft αλεξανδρινω \+it rell\+it* ¦ αλεξανδρηνω [12%] CP\f* \w παρασήμῳ|strong="G3902"\w* \w Διοσκούροις|strong="G1359"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w καταχθέντες|strong="G2609"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w Συρακούσας|strong="G4946"\w* \w ἐπεμείναμεν|strong="G1961"\w* \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w* \w τρεῖς|strong="G5140"\w*·

\w ὅθεν|strong="G3606"\w* \w περιελθόντες|strong="G4022"\w*\f + \fr 28:13 \ft περιελθοντες \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ περιελοντες ℵB [5%] NU\f* \w κατηντήσαμεν|strong="G2658"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ῥήγιον|strong="G4484"\w*. \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w μίαν|strong="G1520"\w* \w ἡμέραν|strong="G2250"\w* \w ἐπιγενομένου|strong="G1920"\w* \w νότου|strong="G3558"\w*, \w δευτεραῖοι|strong="G1206"\w* \w ἤλθομεν|strong="G2064"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ποτιόλους|strong="G4223"\w*,

\w οὗ|strong="G3756"\w* \w εὑρόντες|strong="G2147"\w* \w ἀδελφούς|strong="G0080"\w*, \w παρεκλήθημεν|strong="G3870"\w* \w ἐπ|strong="G1909"\w*᾿\f + \fr 28:14 \ft επ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ παρ ℵA,B [5%] NU\f* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐπιμεῖναι|strong="G1961"\w*\f + \fr 28:14 \ft επιμειναι \+it rell\+it* ¦ επιμειναντες [15%]\f* \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w* \w ἑπτά|strong="G2033"\w*—\w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὕτως|strong="G3779"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ῥώμην|strong="G4516"\w* \w ἤλθομεν|strong="G2064"\w*.\f + \fr 28:14 \ft ηλθομεν \+it rell\+it* ¦ ηλθωμεν [9%] ¦ ηλθαμεν ℵ(A)B [1%] NU ¦ εισηλθομεν [3%]\f*

\w Κἀκεῖθεν|strong="G2547"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀδελφοί|strong="G0080"\w*, \w ἀκούσαντες|strong="G0191"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w περὶ|strong="G4012"\w* \w ἡμῶν|strong="G1473"\w*, \w ἐξῆλθον|strong="G1831"\w*\f + \fr 28:15 \ft εξηλθον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [96%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ηλθαν ℵB,NU ¦ ηλθον A [3%]\f* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w ἀπάντησιν|strong="G0529"\w* \w ἡμῖν|strong="G1473"\w*\f + \fr 28:15 \ft ημιν \+it rell\+it* ¦ ημων [30%] ¦ υμιν ℵ\f* ἄχρις\f + \fr 28:15 \ft αχρις \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [97%] HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ αχρι ℵA,B [3%] RP,NU ¦ αχριμ ℵ\f* \w Ἀππίου|strong="G0675"\w* \w Φόρου|strong="G5410"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w Τριῶν|strong="G5140"\w* \w Ταβερνῶν|strong="G4999"\w*, \w οὓς|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἰδὼν|strong="G3708"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παῦλος|strong="G3972"\w*, \w εὐχαριστήσας|strong="G2168"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεῷ|strong="G2316"\w*, \w ἔλαβεν|strong="G2983"\w* \w θάρσος|strong="G2294"\w*.

\w Ὅτε|strong="G3753"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἤλθομεν|strong="G2064"\w*\f + \fr 28:16 \ft ηλθομεν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [90%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ εισηλθομεν ℵ(A)B [5%] NU ¦ ηλθον [5%]\f* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ῥώμην|strong="G4516"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἑκατόνταρχος|strong="G1543"\w* \w παρέδωκεν|strong="G3860"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w δεσμίους|strong="G1198"\w*\f + \fr 28:16 \ft ο εκατονταρχος (εκατονταρχης OC) παρεδωκεν τους δεσμιους \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (95.3%) HF,RP(OC)TR,CP ¦ — ℵA,B (4.7%) NU\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w στρατοπεδάρχῃ|strong="G4759"\w*·\f + \fr 28:16 \ft τω στρατοπεδαρχη \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (72.2%) RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ 1 στρατοπεδαρχω (22.9%) HF ¦ — ℵA,B (4.9%) NU\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w Παύλῳ|strong="G3972"\w* \w ἐπετράπη|strong="G2010"\w*\f + \fr 28:16 \ft τω δε παυλω επετραπη \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (95.3%) HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ~ 413 ℵA,B (4.7%) NU\f* \w μένειν|strong="G3306"\w* \w καθ|strong="G2596"\w*᾿ \w ἑαυτόν|strong="G1438"\w*, \w σὺν|strong="G4862"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w φυλάσσοντι|strong="G5442"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w*\f + \fr 28:16 \ft αυτον \+it rell\+it* ¦ αυτω [15%]\f* \w στρατιώτῃ|strong="G4757"\w*. Paul and the Jews

\w Ἐγένετο|strong="G1096"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w* \w τρεῖς|strong="G5140"\w* \w συγκαλέσασθαι|strong="G4779"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παῦλον|strong="G3972"\w*\f + \fr 28:17 \ft τον παυλον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [93%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ αυτον ℵA,B [7%] NU\f* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄντας|strong="G1510"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰουδαίων|strong="G2453"\w* \w πρώτους|strong="G4413"\w*· \w συνελθόντων|strong="G4905"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἔλεγεν|strong="G3004"\w* \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w αὐτούς|strong="G0846"\w*· «\w Ἄνδρες|strong="G0435"\w* \w ἀδελφοί|strong="G0080"\w*, \w ἐγὼ|strong="G1473"\w*\f + \fr 28:17 \ft ανδρες αδελφοι εγω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ~ 312 A,B [5%] NU ¦ λεγων 12 ℵ\f* \w οὐδὲν|strong="G3762"\w* \w ἐναντίον|strong="G1726"\w* \w ποιήσας|strong="G4160"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λαῷ|strong="G2992"\w* \w ἢ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔθεσιν|strong="G1485"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πατρῴοις|strong="G3971"\w*, \w δέσμιος|strong="G1198"\w* \w ἐξ|strong="G1537"\w* \w Ἱεροσολύμων|strong="G2414"\w* \w παρεδόθην|strong="G3860"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὰς|strong="G3588"\w* \w χεῖρας|strong="G5495"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ῥωμαίων|strong="G4514"\w*,

\w Ἔμεινεν|strong="G3306"\w*\f + \fr 28:30 \ft εμεινεν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A [96%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ ενεμεινεν B [4%] NU ¦ ενεμειναν ℵ\f* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παῦλος|strong="G3972"\w*\f + \fr 28:30 \ft ο παυλος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] HF,RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵA,B [5%] NU\f* \w διετίαν|strong="G1333"\w* \w ὅλην|strong="G3650"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w ἰδίῳ|strong="G2398"\w* \w μισθώματι|strong="G3410"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀπεδέχετο|strong="G0588"\w* \w πάντας|strong="G3956"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w εἰσπορευομένους|strong="G1531"\w* \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w αὐτόν|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w κηρύσσων|strong="G2784"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w βασιλείαν|strong="G0932"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διδάσκων|strong="G1321"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w περὶ|strong="G4012"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κυρίου|strong="G2962"\w* \w Ἰησοῦ|strong="G2424"\w* \w Χριστοῦ|strong="G5547"\w*,\f + \fr 28:31 \ft χριστου \+it rell\+it* ¦ — ℵ [12%]\f* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w πάσης|strong="G3956"\w* \w παρρησίας|strong="G3954"\w*, \w ἀκωλύτως|strong="G0209"\w*.\f + \fr 28:31 \ft The citation of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* is based on thirty-five MSS—18, 35, 141, 201, 204, 386, 394, 444, 824, 928, 986, 1072, 1075, 1100, 1249, 1482, 1503, 1548, 1617, 1652, 1732, 1761, 1855, 1856, 1864, 1865, 1876, 1897, 2080, 2261, 2352, 2466, 2554, 2587 and 2723—all of which I collated myself. None of them is a ‘perfect’ representative of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* in Acts, as it stands [an unreasonable expectation, presumably, for a book this size]. For all that, several come quite close! Of the MSS I have collated [there may be better ones yet to be done], 1864 deviates from the presumed family profile five times, 18 seven times and 2723 eight times. Turning to their exemplars, that of 35 was off by two, that of 18 and 1864 by three, that of 2723 by four, that of 1865 by five, and that of 824, 1503 and 1897 by six. The uniformity is impressive. Since these MSS come from all over the Mediterranean world (Sinai, Jerusalem, Patmos, Constantinople, Bucharest, Aegean, Trikala, Meteora, Athens, Mt. Athos [seven different monasteries], Grottaferrata, Vatican, Kalavryta, etc.) they are certainly representative of the family, giving us the precise family profile—it is reflected in the Text without exception. In the statements of evidence I have included the percentage of manuscript attestation for each variant within either ( ) or [ ]. I have used ( ) for the evidence taken from \+it TuT\+it*, which I take to be reasonably precise. For the variant sets that are not covered there I used Reuben Swanson’s excellent collations (\+it New Testament Greek Manuscripts: Acts\+it* [Ed. Reuben Swanson, Pasadena, CA: William Carey International University Press, 1998]). For Acts Swanson collated 60 MSS, thirteen being fragmentary (for any given variant set there will usually be at least 45 MSS listed), and I occasionally supplemented from Scrivener and von Soden—the percentages offered, I have used [ ] for these, are extrapolations based on a comparison of these sources. I venture to predict, if complete collations ever become available, that for any non-Byzantine variants listed with 5 to 1% support (in my apparatus) the margin of error should not exceed ±2%; for non-Byzantine variants listed with 10 to 6% support the margin of error should hardly exceed ±4%; where there is some division among the Byzantine witnesses the margin of error should rarely exceed ±15%—since Swanson collated considerably fewer MSS for Acts than he did for Paul’s epistles, and since I find \+it TuT\+it* to be less trustworthy here than in other books, my guesses as to percentages are more tentative than usual, except that I guarantee the witness of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*. For further information please see the final footnote for Matthew.\f*
